item.title: First iOS App: Sending Messages to Slack
item.description: Hey! I have been learning how to program swift because I want to write iOS apps. For the first, I considered start with recognize my previous concepts in this new language for me, here is my “fizzbuzz” example: My guide to learn Swift and iOS are the follow videos and books: Swift Mastering The Core Concepts Building iOS 10 Applications with Swift iOS Programming The Big Nerd Ranch Guide 6Th Edition My First App First, I need to understand this:

item.title: How to send Slack Messages with Groovy
item.description: Recently I have been searching projects for send messages to Slack Channel, and I found many purposes, but I had choose one, and I’ll show you how to use it. It’s very easy! First, you have to go to your slack team, and click on “Apps & Integrations”. Search and choose “Incoming WebHooks”. Add Configuration: choose a channel, and Add Integration. You will get a Webhook URL.
